version_description: It’s a whole NEW FarmVille with a barn load of NEW features!

It’s a whole NEW FarmVille with a barn load of features!

Our new version, fresh from the farm includes:
MORE DECORATIONS - So you can give your farm that cozy feeling!
BUILDING SKINS - To make your farm look like home!
IMPROVED GRAPHICS - The cutest animals you’ve ever seen just got cuter!
EARLY GAME IMPROVEMENTS - To be the most welcoming version of FarmVille yet!

Howdy, Farmers! We've got another farm fresh update, just for you!

We've made some improvements around these parts, and now FarmVille is better than ever!

And those animals? Well, they're still cute as a button!

We hope you’re having fun playing FarmVille 3!

What's New:
Various fixes and improvements

STORAGE
The Barn is easier to upgrade, add extra space for your farm goods!
VISITORS
Fullfil their requests for extra rewards!
FISHING
New visuals that'll hook you!
ACHIEVEMENTS
More trophies to unlock!

Coming back after a break?
Log in your account right from the start of the tutorial!

Have fun!

We listened attentively to your feedback and cooked up a new update for you to enjoy! Let us know what you think about the new update!

FARMHANDS ENERGY
• No more tools! Farmhands now use energy. Energy regenerates over time and when you level up.
• Clearing rubbles is almost instant and can be queued infinitely.
• New items acquired from rubble can now be used in a new factory, the Tinker Station!

EXOTIC ANIMALS
• Koalas and Elephants are now in the game!
• Exotic Animals now require homes just like normal animals
• You no longer need to collect stickers to obtain Exotic Animals

COUNTY FAIR
• Rank up the leaderboard and compete against other players in the fan-favorite County Fair!
• You earn score points by producing and crafting items on your farm
• The highest ranking players at the end of County Fair receive special rewards
• The County Fair can be found close to the Town Hall on the map

Welcome to FarmVille 3, where the animals are cuddly and the farmhands jolly!

GENERAL
- New crafting factories, farmhands and items, for all your crafty needs!
- New events, to keep you entertained
- New rewards, for unlocking new breeds of animals

EXOTIC ANIMALS
- New Saga map
- New training and selection screen
- New rewards

Welcome to FarmVille 3! Here comes a newly, freshly baked update!

GENERAL
- New Museum Events themes
- New Sky Race Seasons and Rewards
- Improvements to Exotic Animals
- Changes to the County Fair leaderboard

Have fun!

Welcome to the world of FarmVille 3, where the grass is green and the cows are cuddly!

In this update:
- New visitors heard from the delicious pies from your farm and come all the way from the city to taste them!
- Sam brings his Food Truck venture to your popular farm to delight visitors with exotic recipes.
- Country camping! A monthly event to unlock unique skins and seasonal costumes for your favorite farmhands to dress up!
- Additional tuning and improvements.

Have fun!

Hello everyone and thank you for your interest in FarmVille 3.

In this update:
- Players can now ask for help filling Orders from the Order Board
- The County Fair now offers additional rewards such as temporary boosts to your Barn & Silo space

FarmVille 3 will be available to download globally on November 4th
Play the game between Nov 4th and Nov. 18th to earn unique decorations for your farm

Marie and her crew of friendly Farmhands will be here to welcome you with open arms!
